caption.p: Coxsackieviral RNA in the T1D pancreas. Representative images of T1D donors 6070 and 6211 from the nPOD cohort. Viral RNA was found within the endocrine area ( A) and outside the islets ( B, C) shown by co-staining of viral RNA probes (red), insulin (green) and DAPI (nuclei; blue). Tissues were first probed for viral RNA, and then stained for insulin after a previously established protocol ([ 77]; Busse et al.). Scale bar depicts 10 Âµm.
